parts.text: {"word":"cruised","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(車・船などが)ゆっくりと走る、巡航する","english_definition":"(of a car, ship, etc.) to travel at a steady speed, especially for pleasure and not in a hurry.","examples":[{"sentence":"We cruised along the coast road.","translation":"私たちは海岸沿いの道をゆっくりと走った。"},{"sentence":"The ship cruised to several Caribbean islands.","translation":"その船はカリブ海のいくつかの島々を巡航した。"},{"sentence":"They cruised around town looking for a place to eat.","translation":"彼らは食事をする場所を探して街をゆっくりと走り回った。"}],"collocations":["cruise along","cruise around","cruise to"],"synonyms":["drift","sail","coast","meander"],"antonyms":["race","speed","hurry"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(人が)気楽に過ごす、のんびりする、楽々と進む","english_definition":"(of a person) to proceed or advance with ease.","examples":[{"sentence":"She cruised through the exam.","translation":"彼女は楽々と試験を乗り切った。"},{"sentence":"He cruised to victory in the race.","translation":"彼はそのレースで楽々と勝利した。"},{"sentence":"They cruised through the project without any problems.","translation":"彼らは何の問題もなくそのプロジェクトを楽々と進めた。"}],"collocations":["cruise through","cruise to victory"],"synonyms":["breeze","sail through","glide","coast"],"antonyms":["struggle","labor","toil"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(人が)(性的パートナーを求めて)うろつく、ぶらつく","english_definition":"(of a person) to move about in a public place looking for a sexual partner.","examples":[{"sentence":"He was cruising in the park.","translation":"彼は公園で（性的パートナーを求めて）うろついていた。"},{"sentence":"They cruised the bars looking for someone to pick up.","translation":"彼らは誰かを探してバーをうろついた。"}],"collocations":["cruise for"],"synonyms":["prowl","wander","roam"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"巡航、クルーズ旅行","english_definition":"a voyage on a ship or boat, usually for pleasure.","examples":[{"sentence":"We went on a cruise to Alaska.","translation":"私たちはアラスカへのクルーズ旅行に行った。"},{"sentence":"The cruise lasted for two weeks.","translation":"そのクルーズは2週間続いた。"}],"collocations":["go on a cruise","take a cruise"],"synonyms":["voyage","sailing","trip"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"「cruise」はオランダ語の「kruisen」（十字に交差する、巡航する）に由来し、もともとは海上で様々な方向へ移動することを意味していました。これが英語に取り入れられ、特定の目的地へ急ぐのではなく、楽しみのためにゆっくりと航海するという意味合いを持つようになりました。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kruːzd/","syllables":"cruised"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["cruise","cruises"],"past_simple":"cruised","past_participle":"cruised","present_participle":"cruising"},"noun_plural":"cruises"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**cruised**」は動詞「cruise」の過去形・過去分詞です。「cruise」は、ゆっくりと快適に進む様子を表す言葉で、車や船などが目的地に向かってのんびりと走る場合や、人が困難なく楽々と物事を進める場合に使われます。また、性的パートナーを探してうろつくという意味もあります。名詞としては、クルーズ旅行を指します。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I cruised the exam with difficulty.","correct":"✓ I cruised through the exam.","note":"「楽々と試験を乗り切る」という意味では、通常「cruise through」という句動詞を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He cruised at the park.","correct":"✓ He cruised in the park.","note":"「公園で（性的パートナーを求めて）うろつく」という意味では、「cruise in」を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ She cruised the test.","correct":"✓ She cruised through the test.","note":"「テストを楽々とこなした」という意味で使う場合は、"cruise through"がより自然です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["cruise (動詞、名詞)","cruiser (名詞: 巡洋艦、クルーザー)","cruising (形容詞、動名詞)"],"phrasal_verbs":["cruise along (順調に進む)","cruise through (楽々と乗り切る)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度 (Relatively high frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**cruised**」は「cruise」という単語の過去形です。「cruise」は、車や船がゆっくりと進むことを意味します。また、人が何かを楽々とこなすときにも使われます。例えば、「He cruised through the test.（彼はテストを楽々とこなした）」のように使います。ただし、性的パートナーを探してうろつくという意味もあるので、文脈に注意して使いましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The boat **cruised** along the river.","translation":"ボートは川をゆっくりと進んだ。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"ゆっくりと走る"},{"sentence":"She **cruised** through her presentation.","translation":"彼女はプレゼンテーションを楽々とこなした。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"楽々と進む"},{"sentence":"They **cruised** the streets looking for a parking spot.","translation":"彼らは駐車スペースを探して通りをゆっくりと走った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"ゆっくりと走る"},{"sentence":"We **cruised** to the Bahamas last summer.","translation":"私たちは昨年の夏にバハマへのクルーズ旅行に行った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"巡航する"},{"sentence":"He **cruised** the bar hoping to meet someone.","translation":"彼は誰かと出会えることを期待してバーをうろついた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"うろつく"}]}
